name: Algrunar
content:
Algrunar was a male Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as an instructor during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. A gray-haired and tan-skinned Human with brown eyes, Algrunar wore tan and gray-green robes with bronze-colored shoulder pauldrons and wielded a single lightsaber. He was stationed on the desert planet Tatooine, where he maintained a base in the city of Anchorhead.
Algrunar first appears as the Jedi Knight class trainer on Tatooine in the 2011 BioWareâ€“LucasArts massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. He is also mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, though his name is misspelled Algruner.
